# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty modify records operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You must set at least one of the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordsOperation/recordsToSave] or [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordsOperation/recordIDsToDelete] properties before you execute the operation.

## Creating a Modify Record Operation

- **init(recordsToSave:recordIDsToDelete:)**: Creates an operation for modifying the specified records.
